titleStmt.title: A general treatise of the diseases of infants and children collected from the best practical authors by John Pechey ...
titleStmt.author: Pechey, John, 1655-1716.

notesStmt.note: Advertisements: p. [4]-[8] at beginning and p. [1]-[8] at end.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
Beginning-p. 2 and p. 19-22 are tightly bound in filmed copy. Beginning-p. 31 photographed from Royal College of Surgeons Library, London copy, and inserted at the end.
